original_text: As was the earthly man, so are those who are of the earth; and as is the heavenly man, so also are those who are of heaven.
korean_text: 무릇 흙에 속한 자들은 저 흙에 속한 자와 같고 무릇 하늘에 속한 자들은 저 하늘에 속한 이와 같으니

sentences.original_text: so are those who are of the earth
and as is the heavenly man
so also are those who are of heaven
